verbose_text: CCK1R expression in the digestive tract plays a role in mediating gallbladder contraction, pyloric sphincter relaxation, pancreatic growth, and pancreatic enzyme secretion and inhibits gastric emptying and gastric acid secretion [XREF_BIBR].
